page.title: 09YOUNG PEOPLE IN SOUTH DEVON
page.content: The first thing that must be said is that there is not much going on for teenagers living in this area.There are primary schools in Holbeton and Newton Ferrers,but all of them have to travel some distance to secondary school;most to Ivybridge (about 7 miles),and some to Plymstock (about 8 miles).As there is no public transport available,they travel on special school buses abd this means that participation in after-school activities is difficult because they cannot get home.Those living in isolated situations do not have much social life,having to rely on parents for transport to friends' houses. There is no night life at all here.A youth club in Holbeton was not used by those interviewed because they say it is boring.Occassionally there may be a disco in Holbeton but most
